episode: I am excited that I will be going to Europe for the very first time next month.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have never been to Europe but am going for the first time next month.  I am very excited!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds amazing! What made you decide to go?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My husband and I are long overdue for a vacation and have been wanted to visit Europe for quite some time.  His sister is doing a Viking cruise and asked us if we want to go along.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How fun! A Viking cruise sounds like an adventure!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We like that you don't actually spend a lot of time on the boat and that we'll get to visit a lot of different places.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a great way to see multiple destinations without changing hotels.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Right.  And if we find someplace we love, we can always go back there in the future as a specific destination.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great attitude, and it's always nice to have a taste of a place before deciding to go back.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The only thing I'm not looking forward to in the long flight from Florida to Brussels.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Long flights can be tough, but it'll be worth it when you arrive!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Any suggestions on what to bring with me on the plane for a flight this long?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Definitely bring a book, headphones, and maybe a travel pillow for comfort.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Those all sound good.  It will be an overnight flight so hopefully I can get some sleep.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fingers crossed you'll get some rest and wake up feeling refreshed in Brussels!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: For sure, I want to be able to get out and do something that first day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You'll want to make the most of your time, especially since you're only there for a short time with the cruise.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm thinking I should get some Euros before I go but not sure where the best place to do that will be.  Definitely before I leave the states.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Good thinking! You can try a bank or a currency exchange office before you leave.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm not sure how much cash I should bring; I'm sure my credit card will work most places.  I even opened a new credit card that doesn't have any foreign exchange fees.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Smart move on the credit card! You'll probably only need some cash for small purchases or street vendors.
